page.title: 14Birdham Industry
page.content: On the main road from Birdham to Chichester there are several small industrial firms. Within the village itself there is a large building firm, W.Stirlands Ltd. A little way out of the village four firms are to be found. Tamplins Engineering Ltd which designs special purpose machinery for the mushroom growing industry. Dunhills which packs coffee filtering items. E. Allman and Co. Ltd.which is the lading United Kingdom manufacturer of agricultural spraying equipment. This firm exports world wide. It employs 130 men and women. Finally there is Allman Removals and Storage for both local and long distance work.
